model.world

Class Door

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.world.Door
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LockedDoor

    public class Door
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for modeling the link between 2 rooms.
    See Also:
    Room

    • Constructor Detail

      • Door

        public Door(Room room1,
            Direction directionFromRoom1,
            Room room2)
        Create a door to link 2 rooms.
        Parameters:
        room1 - Room to link with room2
        directionFromRoom1 - The direction is for the room1. The room to got the opposite direction Direction.getOpposite()
        room2 - Room to link with room1
        See Also:
        Room

    • Method Detail

      • getDirection

        public Direction getDirection(Room room)
        Get the direction of the door in the room pass in parameter
        Parameters:
        room - Room where you want the direction of this door
        Returns:
        The direction of the door.
        See Also:
        Direction

      • isLocked

        public boolean isLocked()
        Return if the door is lock. Return always false in Door. Override in LockedDoor
        Returns:
        Always false in the case where is a simple door. If the door is a locked door, return the state of the door.
        See Also:
        LockedDoor

      • getOppositeRoom

        public Room getOppositeRoom(Room room)
        Get the opposite room through the door of the door pass in parameters.
        Parameters:
        room - Get the opposite of this door
        Returns:
        Opposite room, if the room in parameter isn't on this door, the result is null
